import './index.css'; import telegram from "./img/telegram.svg"; import instagram from "./img/instagram.svg"; import viber from "./img/viber.svg"; import whatsapp from "./img/whatsapp.svg"; import vk from "./img/vk.svg"; import Logo from "../../Logo/Logo"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const Footer = () => { return (

); }; export default Footer;
